value.query: SELECT %vlocity_namespace%__AccountId__c,%vlocity_namespace%__BalanceDue__c,%vlocity_namespace%__CurrentBalance__c,%vlocity_namespace%__DueDate__c FROM %vlocity_namespace%__Statement__c WHERE %vlocity_namespace%__AccountId__c = '{{params.id}}' ORDER BY %vlocity_namespace%__StatementDate__c DESC NULLS FIRST LIMIT 1
